snippet: The suit was filed against former President Ernesto Zedillo by 10 anonymous plaintiffs who said they were survivors of a 1997 massacre.
lead_paragraph: The suit was filed against former President Ernesto Zedillo by 10 anonymous plaintiffs who said they were survivors of a 1997 massacre.

headline.main: Lawsuit Against Ex-President of Mexico Is Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Lawsuit Against Ex-President Is Dismissed
